Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: patch has been submitted and in-review. https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/15543/

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~rameshthoomu I believe this is a Task or Improvement rather than Bug. Please update accordingly.

Action.author: clayton sims
Action.body: Ramesh the fixed version field indicates this bug or task is a 'must fix' for Alpha. Please confirm. If required for alpha, what is eta?

Action.author: clayton sims
Action.body: If required for v1.1 but not alpha then update the fixed version field.

Action.author: ashutosh_kumar
Action.body: ~rameshthoomu : use *exclude* flag instead of *skip.* That should help.

Action.author: ashutosh_kumar
Action.body: Sorry , exclude flag is not going to work. We need to scan one directory at a time.

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: "gas" tool is disabled html report option in the new release. Will run this job as a cron weekly job for each package and publish reports in json format.
